text: Water was released on Friday from Chinnar Dam to irrigate a total of 4500 acres in 13 panchayats in the district. The areas covered would include Panjapali, Periyaanur, Podikuttapalli, Samanur, Athimutlu, Marandahalli, Kujjarahalli, Kolasanahalli, P.Chettihalli, Jerthalav, Palacode, Erranahalli, and Pelarahalli. The 25 cusecs of water released from the dam will also fill up five lakes of the old ayacut here.
title: Water released from Chinnar Dam
